title: AI Research Assistant

hero.headline: Build AI Research Assistants that Actually Understand Your Data
hero.subtext: VoltAgent powers intelligent research agents with built-in memory, RAG, and full observability—see every search, every decision, every source in real-time.

painPoints: Manual research takes hours across multiple sources
Context lost between searches and sessions
No visibility into AI reasoning and decisions
solutions: Full trace of every decision and source

features.title: Build Custom Research Workflows
features.description: Create multi-step research agents that search, analyze, and synthesize information from multiple sources automatically.

features.title: Integrate Any Data Source
features.description: Connect APIs, databases, documents, and web sources. Your agents can access any information your team needs.

features.title: Memory That Learns
features.description: Agents remember context across sessions, building knowledge over time with vector databases like Chroma or Pinecone.

features.title: Full Visibility & Control
features.description: Track every decision, API call, and reasoning step with VoltOps observability. Debug and optimize with confidence.

howItWorks.title: Connect Your Data
howItWorks.description: Link documentation, APIs, databases, and knowledge bases

howItWorks.title: Create Research Agents
howItWorks.description: Define specialized agents for different research tasks

howItWorks.title: Add Tools & Memory
howItWorks.description: Integrate vector DBs, search tools, and persistent memory

howItWorks.title: Monitor in VoltOps
howItWorks.description: Track performance, debug issues, and optimize workflows

faqs.question: How is this different from ChatGPT or Claude?
faqs.answer: VoltAgent provides a framework for building autonomous research agents with memory, tools, and observability. Unlike chat interfaces, these agents can execute complex multi-step research workflows, maintain context across sessions, and integrate with your existing data sources.

faqs.question: What data sources can it connect to?
faqs.answer: VoltAgent supports any API, database, or document store. Built-in integrations include GitHub, Slack, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and all major vector databases (Chroma, Pinecone, Qdrant). You can also add custom tools for proprietary systems.

faqs.question: How long does implementation take?
faqs.answer: Basic research agents can be running in under 30 minutes. Production-ready systems with custom integrations typically take 1-2 weeks depending on complexity and data sources.

faqs.question: Can I see what the AI is doing?
faqs.answer: Yes! VoltOps provides complete observability into every agent decision, tool call, and token usage. You can trace any research path, debug issues, and optimize performance with n8n-style visual workflows.

title: Customer Support Agent

hero.headline: Build Support Agents that Actually Solve Customer Problems
hero.subtext: VoltAgent enables intelligent support automation with context awareness, ticket routing, and real-time escalation—all with complete visibility into every interaction.

painPoints: High volume of repetitive support tickets
Slow response times during peak hours
Lack of context from previous interactions

features.title: Build Intelligent Support Agents
features.description: Create agents that understand context, learn from past tickets, and provide personalized responses.

features.title: Connect Any Knowledge Source
features.description: Integrate documentation, FAQs, product databases, and internal wikis to power accurate responses.

features.title: Custom Escalation Logic
features.description: Define rules for when agents should escalate to humans based on sentiment, complexity, or keywords.

features.title: Omnichannel Integration
features.description: Build agents that work across email, chat, Slack, Discord, or any API-enabled platform.

howItWorks.title: Connect Support Channels
howItWorks.description: Integrate email, chat, Slack, and other communication platforms

howItWorks.title: Train on Your Data
howItWorks.description: Import knowledge base, past tickets, and product documentation

howItWorks.title: Configure Workflows
howItWorks.description: Set up routing rules, escalation triggers, and response templates

howItWorks.title: Monitor & Improve
howItWorks.description: Track resolution rates, customer satisfaction, and optimize responses

testimonial.quote: We reduced our average response time from 2 hours to 30 seconds while maintaining a 94% customer satisfaction score. The visibility into agent decisions helps us continuously improve.
testimonial.author: Michael Rodriguez

faqs.question: Can it handle complex technical support issues?
faqs.answer: Yes. VoltAgent can be configured with technical knowledge bases, API documentation, and debugging tools. It knows when to escalate complex issues to human experts while providing initial triage and data collection.

faqs.question: How does it integrate with our existing support tools?
faqs.answer: VoltAgent has built-in integrations for Zendesk, Intercom, Freshdesk, and can connect to any system via API. It works alongside your existing workflow rather than replacing it.

faqs.question: What about data privacy and security?
faqs.answer: Your data stays in your control. VoltAgent can be self-hosted, supports SSO/SAML, and is SOC2 compliant. All customer interactions are encrypted and can be configured to meet GDPR requirements.

faqs.question: How do we train it on our specific products?
faqs.answer: Import your documentation, FAQs, and past support tickets. The agent learns from your knowledge base and can be fine-tuned with feedback from your support team.

title: Code Review Assistant
navDescription: Automated code reviews with AI insights

hero.headline: Ship Better Code with AI-Powered Reviews
hero.subtext: VoltAgent automates code review workflows with security scanning, best practices enforcement, and intelligent suggestions—all integrated into your GitHub/GitLab workflow.

painPoints: Inconsistent review quality across team members
solutions: Instant automated review on every PR

features.title: Create Custom Review Agents
features.description: Build agents that understand your codebase, standards, and review patterns specific to your team.

features.title: Extensible Security Scanning
features.description: Add custom security rules, integrate SAST tools, and define compliance checks for your industry.

features.title: Your Standards, Automated
features.description: Encode your team's best practices, style guides, and architectural patterns into intelligent agents.

features.title: Continuous Learning
features.description: Agents improve from feedback, learning what matters to your team and adapting over time.

howItWorks.title: Connect Repository
howItWorks.description: Link GitHub/GitLab repos and configure PR triggers

howItWorks.title: Define Standards
howItWorks.description: Set coding standards, security rules, and review criteria

howItWorks.title: Automatic Reviews
howItWorks.description: AI reviews every PR with detailed feedback and suggestions

howItWorks.title: Track Metrics
howItWorks.description: Monitor code quality trends and review effectiveness

testimonial.quote: Our merge time dropped by 40% while code quality actually improved. Junior developers love the instant feedback, and seniors can focus on architecture instead of syntax.
testimonial.author: Lisa Park

faqs.question: Does it replace human code reviewers?
faqs.answer: No, it augments them. VoltAgent handles routine checks, style issues, and common bugs, letting human reviewers focus on architecture, business logic, and complex decisions.

faqs.question: What languages and frameworks does it support?
faqs.answer: TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Go, Rust, and Java are fully supported. The framework is extensible for any language with LSP support.

faqs.question: Can it learn our team's specific patterns?
faqs.answer: Yes! It observes approved PRs and reviewer comments to learn your team's preferences and can be explicitly trained on your codebase patterns.

faqs.question: How does it handle false positives?
faqs.answer: You can mark any suggestion as incorrect, and the agent learns from this feedback. Rules can be customized per repository or team.

faqs.question: How does it determine lead quality?
faqs.answer: The agent uses multiple signals including company size, industry, website behavior, email engagement, and custom criteria you define based on your ICP (Ideal Customer Profile).

faqs.question: Can it handle complex B2B qualification?
faqs.answer: Yes. It can research companies, identify decision makers, assess budget indicators, and even conduct initial discovery conversations via chat or email.

faqs.question: What CRM systems does it work with?
faqs.answer: Native integrations with Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive, and Zoho. Any CRM with an API can be connected via our webhook system.

faqs.question: How quickly can leads be engaged?
faqs.answer: Typically within 1-5 minutes of form submission. The agent can send personalized emails, SMS, or initiate chat conversations immediately.

faqs.question: What systems can the agents integrate with?
faqs.answer: VoltAgent agents can connect to any system with an API including PLCs, SCADA systems, ERP platforms (SAP, Oracle), MES systems, IoT sensors, and custom databases.

faqs.question: How do agents handle real-time data?
faqs.answer: Agents process streaming data from sensors and systems in real-time, using event-driven architecture to respond immediately to anomalies or threshold breaches.

faqs.question: Can agents work with legacy equipment?
faqs.answer: Yes, through edge computing gateways and protocol converters, agents can interface with older equipment that uses industrial protocols like Modbus, OPC, or proprietary formats.

faqs.question: What about data security and compliance?
faqs.answer: VoltAgent supports on-premise deployment, air-gapped networks, and meets industrial compliance standards including ISO 27001, with full audit trails through VoltOps.

faqs.question: How does it handle sensitive citizen data?
faqs.answer: All data is encrypted at rest and in transit, with role-based access control, data residency options, and full compliance with privacy regulations like GDPR and CCPA.

faqs.question: Can it integrate with legacy government systems?
faqs.answer: Yes, VoltAgent supports integration with legacy databases, mainframes, and government-specific platforms through APIs, batch processing, and secure file transfer protocols.

faqs.question: What about multi-language support?
faqs.answer: Agents can communicate in 100+ languages, with automatic translation and culturally appropriate responses for diverse communities.

faqs.question: How is transparency ensured?
faqs.answer: Every decision is logged with full context, reasoning paths are traceable through VoltOps, and all automated actions can be audited and reviewed.

faqs.question: How do agents handle technical troubleshooting?
faqs.answer: Agents can access documentation, analyze logs, run diagnostics, and even execute safe troubleshooting scripts while maintaining security boundaries.

faqs.question: Can it manage multiple customer accounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, agents maintain separate context for each account including custom configurations, SLAs, contact hierarchies, and historical issues.

faqs.question: What about compliance and data security?
faqs.answer: Enterprise-grade security with SOC2, ISO 27001 compliance, data isolation per account, and full audit trails of all interactions.

faqs.question: How does escalation work?
faqs.answer: Agents automatically escalate based on SLA timers, issue severity, customer tier, or specific keywords, routing to the right technical team instantly.
